title: ‘Bullet Train’ and the Top 5 Movies Set on a Train
description:
‘Bullet Train’, a new movie set—you guessed it—on a Bullet Train, hits theaters this weekend. Van Lathan joins Sean to discuss the star-studded Brad Pitt action vehicle, and then they share their top five favorite movies set on the railway (23:00).

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guest: Van Lathan
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
